channel.title: Comments on: A good welcome back

item.title: By: Ray "The Lion King" Bilyk
item.dc:creator: Ray "The Lion King" Bilyk
item.description: <p>You go to go to the pub? All I got to do was move computers and cables from one classroom to another... <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: You go to go to the pub? All I got to do was move computers and cables from one classroom to another… http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif“ />

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>I totally agree big bro, maybe mum needs a "pop" of that yummy stuff hehe, I'm sooooo cheeky lol. Glad your enjoying being back in England and you brought the nice weather with you<br/><br /></p>
item.content:encoded: I totally agree big bro, maybe mum needs a “pop” of that yummy stuff hehe, I’m sooooo cheeky lol. Glad your enjoying being back in England and you brought the nice weather with you

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>It most certainly looks like popcorn to me big bro, maybe mum should have a a "pop" at it, hehe. I'm enjoying my new role at work,hope your enjoying the mild weather </p>
item.content:encoded: It most certainly looks like popcorn to me big bro, maybe mum should have a a “pop” at it, hehe. I’m enjoying my new role at work,hope your enjoying the mild weather

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I think it's meant to be a bag of popcorn! Just trying out one of the new looks that I can use with the blog. Will probably be changing a lot over the next few days.</p>
item.content:encoded: I think it’s meant to be a bag of popcorn! Just trying out one of the new looks that I can use with the blog. Will probably be changing a lot over the next few days.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif"</a> /> Why the change to the red/black and what looks like cigarette advertising? I presume it's supposed to be candles but is ambiguous!</p>
item.content:encoded: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif“ /> Why the change to the red/black and what looks like cigarette advertising? I presume it’s supposed to be candles but is ambiguous!
